subject: Juggling and Jugglers
New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: A look at Jack Hirschowitz, 67, who combined juggling and jogging in the early 1990s, thinking it was his own oddity. It was not.
snippet: A look at Jack Hirschowitz, 67, who combined juggling and jogging in the early 1990s, thinking it was his own oddity. It was not.
